oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Seven Puryear brothers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Top row: Gustavus Adolphus (Doll), Romulus (Rom), Alfred (Alf). Bottom row: William (Will), Daniel (Dan), George, David (Dave).

Romulus Claiborne Wright Puryear (1874-1945), William Pierce Puryear Sr. (1876-1954), Daniel Oglesby Puryear (1879-1956), David Buford Puryear (1882-1929), Gustavus Adolphus Puryear (1885-1939), Alfred Isaac Puryear (1889-1982), George Wright Puryear (1894-1919).
